author: IANS
title: ‘The Dark Knight Rises’, ‘Aliens’ actor Jay Benedict succumbs to COVID-19
description: Benedict, who was 68, was best known for playing Russ Jordan in James Cameron’s 1986 release ‘Aliens’
content:
Aliens and The Dark Knight Rises actor Jay Benedict has tragically passed away after suffering complications from the coronavirus. He was 68.
His official website announced: It is with profound sorrow that we must announce Jays death on the 4th of April due … [+1727 chars]
